FuncDef:
The mpls te cspf command enables Constrained Shortest Path First (CSPF).
The undo mpls te cspf command disables CSPF.
This command varies in transport and router modes. For detailed differences, see Differences Between Commands in Transport and Router Modes. This topic describes the command configuration in router mode.
By default, CSPF is disabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
CSPF provides a mechanism of selecting a path in an MPLS domain. CSPF must be enabled before other CSPF-related configurations are performed.
Prerequisites
MPLS TE must be enabled in the MPLS view before CSPF is enabled.
